meanings.sent1: She carefully stretched the rubber band to reach the other side of the table.
meanings.sent2: The cat stretched its body lazily after waking up from a nap.
meanings.sent3: He stretched the truth a bit to make his story more interesting.
meanings.sent4: The road stretched out before them, seemingly endless in the distance.
meanings.sent5: The dancer gracefully stretched her arms out to form a perfect line.

meanings.sent1: He stretched the rope as far as he could to secure the boat to the dock.
meanings.sent2: The weightlifter stretched his muscles before attempting to lift the heavy barbell.
meanings.sent3: She stretched the dough carefully to make sure the pizza crust was just right.
meanings.sent4: The old bridge creaked as the weight of the truck stretched its cables.
meanings.sent5: The fabric stretched to its limit as she tried to fit into the tight dress.

meanings.sent1: She stretched the elastic band to hold the papers together.
meanings.sent2: The painter carefully stretched the canvas before starting to paint.
meanings.sent3: He stretched the wire across the garden to keep the rabbits out.
meanings.sent4: The spider silk stretched across the path, shimmering in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's muscles stretched and flexed as he prepared for the race.
